Class RewardsController

java.lang.Object
com.rewardservice.controller.RewardsController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/v1/api/rewards") public class RewardsController extends Object
REST Controller for handling transaction-related API requests.

  • Method Details

    • getRewardsPointsForTheMonths

      @GetMapping public Map<Long,Map<String,Integer>> getRewardsPointsForTheMonths(@RequestParam(required=false) Integer months)
      Endpoint to retrieve the reward points for each customer for the specified number of months.
      Parameters:
      months - the number of months to consider; if null, defaults to 3 months
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the customer ID and the value is another map with the month as the key and the total reward points as the value

    • addTransaction

      @PostMapping("/add") public TransactionDTO addTransaction(@RequestBody TransactionDTO transactionDTO)
      Endpoint to add a new transaction.
      Parameters:
      transactionDTO - the transaction data transfer object containing the transaction details
      Returns:
      the added transaction data transfer object

    • addTransactions

      @PostMapping("/add-multiple") public List<TransactionDTO> addTransactions(@RequestBody List<TransactionDTO> transactionDTOList)
      Endpoint to add multiple transactions.
      Parameters:
      transactionDTOList - the list of transaction data transfer objects containing the transaction details
      Returns:
      the list of added transaction data transfer objects
